column5: I was looking around and I saw this reel.  http://www.ebay.ca/itm/Fly-Fishing-Raft-Fishing-Reel-Ratio-3-1-3-1BB-/371030772822?pt=LH_DefaultDomain_0&hash=item5663284c56  It seem a little odd. Has anyone ever used one? I can't see it used for fly fishing as the handle would probably catch any loose fly line.  Muddler
Yeah, it's an ice fishing reel.
Yeah, it's an ice fishing reel. Although borderline mentally challenged............... Ryan is correct!! lol I joke I joke that thing looks like its made of plastic...
